callouts.author: If something here made you laugh, smile, or throw your ball into the nearest water hazard, you can reach out at george@birdiebriefing.com.
callouts.newsletter: Stay in the loop with the latest LPGA updates and golf insights. Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive content delivered to your inbox.
callouts.podcast: Listen to our latest podcast episode for deeper insights and behind-the-scenes stories from the world of women's golf.
callouts.social: Follow us on social media for real-time updates, player interviews, and exclusive content from the LPGA tour.
callouts.feedback: Have thoughts on this article? We'd love to hear from you! Share your feedback and join the conversation.
